tbltools 0.1.0

Create tbl_data_frame

Source: R/tbl_frame.R
tbl_data_frame.Rd

Creates a data frame using non-standard evaluation

tbl_data_frame(...)

Arguments

...

Column vectors or expressions that reduce down to desired column vectors of data frame

Value

A tbl_data data frame

Examples


## create data frame with two random variables
tbl_data_frame(
  a = rnorm(10),
  b = rnorm(10)
)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 2
#>          a       b
#>      <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 -0.206  -0.510 
#>  2  1.09    0.668 
#>  3  0.761  -2.12  
#>  4 -1.41    0.0457
#>  5 -0.0558 -0.433 
#>  6  0.148  -1.55  
#>  7  0.622   0.871 
#>  8 -2.33    0.0488
#>  9 -0.523   0.170 
#> 10 -0.604   0.0747

## create variables calculated using previous variables
tbl_data_frame(
  a = rnorm(10),
  b = rnorm(10),
  c = (a + b) / 2,
  d = a + b + c
)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 4
#>         a       b       c      d
#>     <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1  0.288  0.818   0.553   1.66 
#>  2 -0.434 -2.29   -1.36   -4.09 
#>  3 -0.145  0.0451 -0.0501 -0.150
#>  4 -0.957  0.367  -0.295  -0.885
#>  5 -2.42   0.0427 -1.19   -3.56 
#>  6  0.303 -0.743  -0.220  -0.659
#>  7 -1.31  -0.242  -0.778  -2.34 
#>  8 -0.187 -1.38   -0.781  -2.34 
#>  9 -0.259 -1.36   -0.808  -2.42 
#> 10 -0.667  0.445  -0.111  -0.334
